attributes.action: ALLOW THE BNP AN EQUAL PLATFORM WITH ALL OTHER PARTIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Far too often, members of all political parties, shun the BNP and refuse to share a platform with them at major political debates. These members should stop being so childish and remember that whether they like it or not the BNP is a legally operating organisation

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
